Paulo Reyes

Videogame developer
Github link Email link Linkedin link

I'm a videogame programmer, just what I aspired to be the first time I've ever touched a console as a kid. I was always intrigued in how lines of code are translated to whatever we see in a game, from the most simple thing, just like a character's jump, to the most complicated of AI behaviours. Nowadays, I get great satisfaction whenever I achieve to answer all those questions I had as a kid.

I love creating games, and I'm always looking for new opportunities to work on projects that challenge me and help me grow as a developer. I'd love to meet people who share the same passion for games and game development as I do. If you're interested in working together, please don't hesitate to reach out.

My Projects

Last Robot in Earth

A 3D platformer game similar to Wipeout with Twitch integration, where one player controls a robot that must reach the end of the level while avoiding obstacles from the environment and Twitch chat.

See more
Branching Sickness

Currently working on a Halo fan game. A Flood horror game where the player must cross every level while avoiding the infection forms.

See more
Catch the Bunny

A VR multiplayer game where one player controls a bunny (desktop), and the other player controls a hunter (VR) that must catch the bunny before the time runs out.
